desc.p: This field is associate multi-value field alongwith the field Currency and will contain value of NOSTRO account. It is use for payment purpose.
Must exist on the ACCOUNT table
Indicates the name of counterparty who are members of the CLS.
Should be a valid Id of customer table.
This field is associate multi-value field alongwith the field NOSTRO.ACC and will contain value of currency.
Must exist on the CURRENCY table
Holds the value of SHORT.NAME from CUSTOMER for the corresponding CPARTY.ID.
For the corresponding CPARTY.ID entered, the value of field CUS.SHORT.NAME
This field will contain the time on which the deal must be submitted.
Must be a valid time entry
